message.value: Constant name must be from 5 to 35 characters long.
Local variable name must be from 3 to 32 characters long.
Local variable name must be from 3 to 32 characters long.
Field name must be from 3 to 32 characters long.
Method name must be from 4 to 35 characters long.
Package name ''{0}'' may include plurals. It''s recommended to use singular form in package names.
Parameter name must be from 3 to 32 characters long.
Static variable name must be from 4 to 35 characters long.
Type name must be from 4 to 36 characters long.

property.name: illegalPkgs
property.value: sun, org.jboss, org.apache.catalina, org.postgresql, log4j, org.apache.commons.logging, java.util.logging

property.name: ignoreOccurrenceContext
property.value: ANNOTATION, ANNOTATIONS, ARRAY_INIT, ARRAY_DECLARATOR, COMMENT_CONTENT, ASSIGN

property.name: maximumMessage
property.value: Use lambdas instead of anonymous classes.
